actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend section 620, title 38, United States Code, to authorize direct admission to community nursing homes at the expense of the U.S. Government.

summary.text: Permits the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs to authorize direct admission to public or private nursing homes of veterans requiring such care, at the expense of the United States Government. (Amends 38 U.S.C. 620(d))

titles.title: A bill to amend section 620, title 38, United States Code, to authorize direct admission to community nursing homes at the expense of the U.S. Government.
